title: President condoles with Dr Tariq Fazal on death of son
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 24 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi Monday here arrived at the residence of Dr Tariq Fazal Chaudhry and condoled on the death of his young son.The President expressed grief and sorrow over the death of his son and prayed to Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.
